full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement - Lambda Vector or Equivalent Workstation for NRC

## Publication Information

* Document Title (English): Lambda Vector or Equivalent Workstation for NRC
* Document Title (French): Poste de travail vectoriel Lambda ou équivalent pour le CNRC
* Reference Number: SSC-23-00022442:T
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: BPM018627/22442
* Publication Date: March 29, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: April 17, 2023, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: April 11, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expired

## Overview

The National Research Council (NRC) has a requirement for two Lambda Vector or Equivalent workstations. The National Research Council has issued a Request for Quotation (RFQ) to meet this requirement.

## Description of Requirement

The NRC requires two Lambda Vector or Equivalent workstations for research projects and machine learning. The equipment is required to support research officers in their work.

## Delivery and Terms

* Delivery Destination: Toronto, Ontario
* Delivery Date: 30 federal government working days from contract award
* Security Requirements: N/A
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements: N/A

## Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: BPM018627/22442
* Request for Quotation (RFQ) Document: [Insert link to RFQ document]
* Deadline for Responses: April 17, 2023, 14:00:00

## Contact Information

* Procurment Officer: Sorn Prak
* Email: [sorn.prak@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:sorn.prak@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-298-2073
* Address: SSC Shared Service Canada, 400 Cooper St, 6th floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2H8

Please note that this is an expired tender. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The response with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.
